DAILY_DESCRIPTION: You can use this command every 24 hours to claim your daily rewards. The bigger your Daily streak is, the higher the rewards will be. Every 3/7 days of your streak, you will also receive a chest that contains additional items
DAILY_ERROR: You can claim your next **Daily** in **{{timeout}}**
COMMON_CHEST: <:commonchest:927502629997805608> **{{count}}x** more **Daily** claims left to receive a **Common Chest**
RARE_CHEST: <:rarechest:927204672270372874> **{{count}}x** more **Daily** claims left to receive a **Rare Chest**
NOTE:
⚠️ Discord, as well as Sofi Staff will NEVER ask you for your password or advise you to change your E-Mail to a specific address. Beware of third-party discord BOTs that are often used for similar phishing attempts!

Any suspicious activity should be immediately reported at {{link}} ⚠️
